info.author: Huang Jiangbin
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
zencore-conf
============


.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/zencore-dobetter/zencore-conf.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/zencore-dobetter/zencore-conf

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/zencore-conf/badge/?version=latest
    :target: http://zencore-conf.readthedocs.io/zh/latest/?badge=latest
    :alt: Documentation Status


Zencore Configuration



Classes
-------

1. Settings


Functions
---------

1. load_object

#. load_params

#. load_urls

load_object workflow
--------------------

1. import from string: target.

#. if provides params, call target with params as new_target.

#. if provides method, select method or method.target from new_target as new_target.

#. if provides method.params, call new_target with method.params.

#. and so on...

load_params workflow
--------------------

1. params is a list

#. if provides name field, it's a key-value parameter, and keep it in kwargs

#. if not provides name field, it's a positional parameter, and keep it in args

#. return tuple (args, kwargs)


=====
Usage
=====

Example Configuration
---------------------

.. code:: yaml

    services:
      - target: x1.y1.z1
      - target: x2.y2.z2
        params:
          - value: p1
          - value: p2
          - name: k3
            value: p3
          - name: k4
            value: p4
      - target: x3.y3.z3
        params:
          - value: p1
          - value: p2
          - name: k3
            value: p3
          - name: k4
            value: p4
        method: m1
      - target: x4.y4.z4
        params:
          - value: p1
          - value: p2
          - name: k3
            value: p3
          - name: k4
            value: p4
        method:
          target: m2
      - target: x5.y5.z5
        params:
          - value: p1
          - value: p2
          - name: k3
            value: p3
          - name: k4
            value: p4
        method:
          target: m3
          params:
            - value: p1
            - value: p2
            - name: k3
                value: p3
            - name: k4
                value: p4
      - target: x6.y6.z6
        params:
          - value: p1
          - value: p2
          - name: k3
            value: p3
          - name: k4
            value: p4
        method:
          target: m3
          params:
            - value: p1
            - value: p2
            - name: k3
                value: p3
            - name: k4
                value: p4
          method: m3m1
info.name: zencore-conf
